attributes.action: actively campaign for good governance in Africa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The People of Africa continue to suffer from preventable diseases, lack of infrastructure and hardship mostly beacuse of bad leadership. The consequences of corruption and visionless leadership are determined and expressed in the number of hungry children, mortgaged futures and internecine wars ravaging every corner of the continent.  Corruption and fraud has stiffled development and the bottom has dropped out of the nations giving the poor and the weak no chance.  Prime Minister, for the sake of the ordinary people, please use your influence to actively campaign for good governance in Africa.
